pci_projects_project_storages_containers: Develop your S3/Swift APIs with our Object Storage solution — a simple solution for managing your data.
A basic storage solution with no specific requirements for performance. This is the native object storage of OpenStack, with Swift APIs.
The perfect storage solution for high volumes of data at the best price. A wide range of S3 APIs are available with this solution.
You can give access to the container to one of your preconfigured Openstack users with an "Administrator" or "Object Storage Operator" role, or you can create a new user.
Quick access and high performance. Link your domains and transfer your files.
Multimedia, binaries, e-commerce. Store an enormous amount of data.
Billing, legal information, logs. Archive it simply, in a way that suits you.
The container name must be between 3 and 63 characters, must start and end with lower-case alphanumeric characters (a to z and 0 to 9), and may include the following punctuation marks: ‘.’ and ‘-’.

Highly resilient deployment, accessible in 3 different availability zones.
Resilient and low cost deployment in 1 availability zone.
